```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)

test_data <- read_csv("data/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/test.csv")
train_data <- read_csv("data/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/train.csv")
train_data
test_data

full_housing <- full_join(train_data, test_data)
full_housing

```


```{r}
summary(train_data)
str(full_housing)
```


```{r}
# Exclude YearBuilt because YearRemodAdd shows latest qualities when sold
# Exclude Conditions because that is caused by wear over time
full_house <- full_housing |>
select(YearRemodAdd, OverallQual, ExterQual,YrSold,SaleType, SaleCondition, Neighborhood,BldgType, HouseStyle,Foundation) |>
arrange(YrSold) 
full_house
```
